page.title: 20HOME LIFE-WINTHORPE
page.content: We live in a detached{house}in Winthorpe. We have nine rooms, our lounge-dining room has a sofa, two chairs, a table, an organ, a book shelf, a record player, television, video and cassette recorder. We{cook}by gas and there is a central heating radiator in each room,to clean we use a hoover, and an automatic washing machine cleans our clothes. We own two cars . A typical tea for us would be cheese, bread, salad, fruit and cake. In winter we eat more hot{food.} On Sunday we might have a big lunch of roast beef, yorkshire puddings, potatoes and vegetables. Our garden is quite small. We grow flowers, herbs, vegetables and fruit. In my spare time I watch the television, read,draw and sew.I also play the clarinet.
